nano.remexp.broadcaster.locks
Class GotoLock

java.lang.Object
  nano.remexp.broadcaster.locks.LockHolder
      nano.remexp.broadcaster.locks.GotoLock

public class GotoLock
extends LockHolder

The lock for the goto# commands that move the robotic stage to a sample. These locks are associated with one sample that is read from the configuration file.

Version:
1.1 29.8.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch
